name: Blue One
description:
Blue One is 2d platformer with little blue alien as main protagonist who is trying to escape different world scenarios and get to it's escape space ship.

Main goal on each level is to collect three gas barrels and get to the space ship avoiding all harming obstacles.

Game has two different worlds with eight levels each and two boss fights. There is also multiplayer mode included where two players can battle against each other in split screen.

Enjoy in retro texture vibes mixed with modern lighting systems and some good classical background music!
